BlackStorm:

The scarnner said that all memoried of Nightlight had been erased, 
it also showed a latent program inside her. It also showed all 
damage that she had been recieved even the Darkangel's pubch in her 
Jaw


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Assassin" <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> 
> Rodimus layes Elita down in her crib.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: I'm sorry to leave you again, but I have to go see 
> that mommy gets better.
> 
> Rodimus walks to Yggdrasil's position.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: Ok, let's undo what those Predacon scum did. After

from
